website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, durable, hard-shell luggage set that comes in several easy-to-spot colors.
pros: Customers love how smoothly this lightweight set rolls, making it a great option for frequent travelers
The TSA locks provide good security
cons: The exterior is prone to scratches
Exterior dimensions are the maximum size for most airlines

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: A 5* product I bought this for my mom and she absolutely loves this. The light blue color and the sturdyness and maneuverability of it is wonderful. She is a small lady that needs as much help as she can get to move her luggage around. Good job!! I highly recommend this product. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Livlovlife

customer_reviews.title: Merax Luggage Set
customer_reviews.text: luggage arrived within a couple of days, looks just like the picture. We used it on our cruise and and it was great, rolls very well, I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Endured several international flights
customer_reviews.text: Quite happy with the purchase. I've traveled internationally from the US to three international destinations (which included 5 times claiming my luggage and re-checking them). I have close to 50 lbs of contents in the 2 larger containers and it held well.
customer_reviews.author: EvanstonStuff

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of luggages
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really and inexpensive set of luggage. I traveled overseas and went through different terrains and it handled very well. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Madelin Castillo

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. Stood up to airline abuse very well. TSA locks worked perfectly contrary to some reviews. One thing we found was that if you fill up the largest suitcase with regular items (clothing etc.) it will DEFINITELY exceed the airline's 50 lb limit.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Berglund

customer_reviews.title: Great set.foe price!
customer_reviews.text: Not a $600 set but great for the price! Nice features and color true as shown. TSA lock included and has several pockets inside each case. They also nestle nicely for storage.
customer_reviews.author: mike Hurlbert

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: Was kind of excited when it arrived only to find out it came with scratches. Not Scratch resistant. Went of my trip, and came back with more scratches. Other than that it’s a good luggage, but who wants to travel around with a beat up luggage. My sister bought another Luggage brand and it was way better than this one, not 1 scratch on it after our trip. i will buy from them on my next luggage purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus t.

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Rolling could be smoother but it’s not bad. I think the space was perfect. Traveled from Florida to Japan and not a problem. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Conner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any Traveler
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a trip to California. They worked perfectly I only needed the larger size for the 5 days we were gone. These are so great.
customer_reviews.author: Riana Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Durable!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the set. They look nice and they are very sturdy. I traveled with them overseas and they held up very well! The only downside is that the inner ziper is set kind of low. It doesn't allow for maximum utilization of the compartment. Other than that it is great!!
customer_reviews.author: essam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made luggage
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing new luggage in years. The color is beautiful, and they are lightweight. The wheels seem to be fine, but they aren’t doubled like some other luggage. Otherwise very satisfied! Love my new luggage.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value!!
customer_reviews.text: I am over the moon about this set. I can’t wait to use it later this month. The lock is almost impossible to figure out the directions for it and it seems as tho is wouldn't be very sturdy. Other than that LOVE them.
customer_reviews.author: S.R. Rochester, NY

customer_reviews.title: Good luggage
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a good value @ this point as we haven’t used it for a trip. It will be use soon for a 5 day cruise.
customer_reviews.author: James Newman

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved items in a timely manner via Fedex. Items seem to be 100% as advertised. Telescopic handle mountings seem a little flimsy, time will tell. Each item included reset instructions for locks.
customer_reviews.author: MD Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Luggage
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel, will taje a beating,cant over stuff, wheels hard to roll
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Whoop whoop
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product so far, showed up to the casa way early which I'm always happy for that. Can't wait to use for vacation this year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a great deal for 3 luggages. It's nice quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cute
customer_reviews.text: I just got these a week ago and they’re so cute! I got them in the color blue and I am inlove. Super lightweight. I love the fact that you can divided the suitcase into two different compartments!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn

customer_reviews.title: Very Green
customer_reviews.text: Very cool green color. Will definitely be able to see the during baggage claim with no problem. I have not used the product yet, however these case seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have!
customer_reviews.text: Want to Chicago & California with these! They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Christan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best suitcase I have ever purchased. The zippers and wheels glide soo smoothly. The size, color a durability are incredible. So easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good hardcase suitcase set
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Mostly used the small one as a carry on. Seems to be well built with a lot of thought put into it.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Avg but worth for cost
customer_reviews.text: Look wise it is good but.. it not that strong as it said in description. Just good for 1 to 2 times use
customer_reviews.author: M.Girish Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my fiancé. He absolutely loves the color of it. So far so good. We will be doing a lot of traveling in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered! Locks work great and easy to reset! Can wait for my next trip!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Looking good! Waiting to travel with them!
customer_reviews.text: Like the color 👍🏽 Zippers feel very light.... hoping they would last
customer_reviews.author: Chiny

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a very great and quality product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality material!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed with the quality of the material. I also like the colors, they look great. Not heavy at all. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Abdel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 3in1
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Each child their own suitcase. Ideal too for personal get away or just date drive. Living the prospects
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Luggage set 3-pieces
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stuff! Took the bags on a trip up to Alaska. The smallest unit can be a carry-on or checked. It fit in the overhead bins fine, even on a regional commuter jet. Well designed and tough for today’s airline baggage apes.
customer_reviews.author: BassetHoundsRule

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am very very happy with this purchase. The suitcases are well built and came as described by the seller. The color is fantastic and just an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, made it without a scratch or dent!
customer_reviews.text: This works great, they are lightweight and very maneuverable even when full. Very easy to pick out at luggage claim because not very many dark blue, mostly black color. Fit family of four for 2 week vacation to Mexico. Love the TSA locks.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Moore

customer_reviews.title: Merax Luggage set is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is our second set of Merax luggage and we love them.. They are of the highest quality and the price is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Real sturdy. We are ready to travel now
customer_reviews.text: Really like the locking mechanism. Don’t need extra locks. Luggage looks like it will take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Campney

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! It is lightweight and well made, will update on durability after we go on our trip!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Nice suitcase
customer_reviews.text: My mother liked this. It was nice and was much needed for her international trip. We only wish it was a bit more spacious as that kind of material can't be stretched.
customer_reviews.author: Kettelie Douce

product_meta.title: Merax Luggage Set with TSA Lock, All Expandable 3 Piece Hardshell Lightweight Suitcase Set 20inch 24inch 28inch (Blue)
feature_bullets: Sleek and contemporary look with stratch-resistant finish. Lightweight durable ABS 3 piece luggage set.
Expandable hard-shell increases depth by 2" on all 3 pieces — not all hardside carry-ons can say the same.
Telescoping pull handle adjusts to 3 heights, silent 360-degree spinner wheels, making navigation through the crowd a breeze.

TSA approved combination lock to keep your stuff safe. Spacious compartment with integrated mesh pocket, zipper pouches and tie-down straps to keep your belongings organized. Merax 3 piece luggage set is perfect to meet your extensive travel needs, whether for vacations or business trips.

Free 5-Year Worldwide Warranty. The complete 3 piece suitcase set will be shipped with each suitcase inside one another to save space for your convenience. How to reset TSA lock: https://youtu.be/TbOpl4m4IwE

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars106 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
